titleStmt.title: The presentment of the grand-jury, at Justice-Hall, in the Old-Bayly, on the 16th of January, 1683. We the jurors, sworn to inquire for our Sovereign Lord the King, of all offences committed in the City of London ...
titleStmt.author: London (England). Grand Jury.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Croom, at the Blew Ball in Thames-street, over against Baynard's Castle,

notesStmt.note: Year dates given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blew Ball in Thames-street, over against Baynard's Castle
